title: Lovely Home ready to move in Now !
posting_body: Make sure to stop by your new home!
Call to schedule a visit with one of our friendly leasing consultants today!
The Domicilio Apartment Community offers amazing studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom homes!
Your new home will allow you to immerse yourself in nearby culture at the Triton Museum of art or in the downtown Santa Clara scene!
Our community has tons of amazing amenities that are practically at your front door!
Additional Storage on Balcony • Fitness Center w/ Complimentary Trainer Sessions • Guest Suites Available • Controlled-Access Community • Electric Vehicle EV Charging Stations •
Resort-Inspired pool • Theater with Stadium-style Seating •
Bike Racks • Elevator • Free Weights • Spa/Hot Tub

*Complete Stainless Appliance package • Breathtaking Views and Natural Light • Designer Track Lighting in Dining Areas • Full-size Washers and Dryers • Gourmet Kitchens with Granite Countertops • Master Baths with Double-sinks* • Personal Balconies or Patios • Pre-wired for Alarm Systems •
Stainless Steel Sinks • Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floor*
Pets - Max 2 allowed Comments: Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy information.
Cats - allowed Dogs - allowed We Love Pets!
Due to COVID-19 restrictions imposed by local and state health orders, certain amenities may not be available or their availability may be limited in order to comply with the health orders.
